participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of coming out to my parents because they might not be accepting.
I sometimes forget to walk my dogs, which I know is not good for them.
i read tons of books.
people don t like me too much but i like them anyways.
My favorite TV shows are ones that make me laugh and forget about my troubles.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy baking with my father, and the most valuable thing I own is the time we spend together.
1984 is my favorite book.
i like action movies.
i have twelve kids.
My biggest challenge was overcoming my eating disorder.

content.text: I love to read! What are some of your favorite books?
I have a few favorites, but 1984 is one of my all time favorites.
I've heard good things about that book, but I've never read it. I should check it out sometime.
You definitely should! It's a great read.
What's your favorite part about it?
I think the way it explores the dangers of totalitarianism is really interesting.
Totalitarianism is a scary thought. I'm glad we don't have to worry about that happening in the U.S.
I hope not! But it's always good to be aware of the dangers of it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy baking with my dad. We like to experiment with different recipes and see what we can come up with.
That sounds like a lot of fun! My dad and I don't do a lot of things together, but I think we'd both enjoy baking.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a great way to bond with your dad.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
